_source.short_desc: Automate camp registration expertly with a full suite of online registration and payment tools to make camp management easy!
_source.long_desc: Automate camp registration and online payments expertly with a full suite of software tools to make camp management easy! Regpack's solution works for in-person and virtual camps and includes customized discounts, automated payment plans, custom forms, triggered emails, dynamic filtering and reporting tools, and more. A project manager will set everything up for you so you can focus on your camp and not on the paperwork.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing starts at $125 per admin license and includes unlimited users, projects, emails, reports, and more. Learn more with a free demo and by contacting Regpack directly for more pricing information.
_source.target_audience: Organizations that want to save hours, get paid quickly, increase revenue and grow enrollment. Complex build options and integrated payments automate and streamline registration and payments.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most Affordable Event Management Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Simple activity management tools built by parents for educators. Billing, scheduling, parent communications, and more, made easy!
related_products.features: Sawyer is an all-in-one software that allows camps to build custom schedules and easily manage online registration, payment processing, parent communications and more. We support all types of camp schedules - full and half-day camps, as well as weekly specialties. Our dedicated, top-rated support team provides training videos, webinars, and business resources to bring our community together. Our software is flexibly priced to suit your business and requires no long term contracts.

related_products.short_desc: CampMinder is the summer camp industry's most comprehensive web-based camp management system. We help summer camps achieve their goals!
related_products.features: CampMinder is the summer camp industry's most comprehensive web-based camp management software. Our signature systems enable management of operational processes at camp including online registration, healthcare, staffing, transportation, cabin & group assignments, and much more. Our Campanion mobile app gives parents and staff a first-class experience each summer. And our newest platform is Gazebo, An intuitive, powerful, device-agnostic digital platform for managing every aspect of events.

related_products.short_desc: CampDoc is the leading electronic health record system for camps- it's designed BY camp doctors and staff, FOR camp doctors and staff!
related_products.features:
CampDoc is the leading electronic health record system for camps, and the only camp management system designed BY camp doctors, nurses and directors FOR camp doctors, nurses and directors! 
 Our secure, easy-to-use web-based solution offers online registration and form collection, allergy and medication management, pre-screening and illness/injury tracking, and much more, helping camps keep safety in the forefront of operations

related_products.short_desc: Take the guesswork of collecting important camper information with our fully-customizable online forms.
related_products.features: More than camp registration software. Amilia combines online registration and e-commerce, to create a seamless user experience that allows you to do more while managing less. It's the camp management solution you've been waiting for. From emergency contacts to medical specifications to permission slips and even photo ID, all your camper information is accessible in just a few clicks.

related_products.short_desc: CampSite was designed by camp directors for camp directors. Run your best camp with our comprehensive camp management software system!
related_products.features: CampSite is an intuitive and complete camp management solution for day camps, residential camps, and school and specialty programs. Save staff time by automating and organizing processes with our easy-to-use customizable software. Favorite modules include transportation, medical management, advanced reporting, automated attendance, bunking board, and more! Routine feature updates, 5-star ongoing support, and an industry-backed reputation make CampSite the most preferred camp management software.

related_products.short_desc: Jumbula - a complete platform to handle online registrations, manage classes & camps, and engage in online marketing
related_products.features: If you are looking for an easy-to-use, flexible, and affordable online registration & camp management system, then Jumbula is for you. Our web-based solution can handle online registrations for all your camps, classes or events. Use our admin dashboard to easily manage your programs and grow your business. Jumbula will help you automate your registration process, attract more users, make smarter decisions and save time. Try us for FREE today!

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 3,000 camp and afterschool organizers, ACTIVE Network  is the leading provider of online camp management software
related_products.features: ACTIVE offers an all-in-one camp management and marketing software solution. Whether you run overnight summer camps, day camps, sports camps and clinics, art classes, educational camps,  or other types of youth programs, ACTIVE's cloud-based software and customer service team is at your side to lighten your load and let you make smart, data-driven decisions while also helping you deliver great experiences to your campers and their families.

related_products.short_desc: NewBook's all-in-one campground management platform can help you increase your direct online bookings by up to 600%!
related_products.features: NewBook's campground management platform was built by campground owners, for campground owners. Our software can help you streamline your operations, save you valuable time and money, increase your online reach, and maximize your revenue potential. Need proof? Our end-to-end campground management solution has helped our users increase direct reservations by up to 600%!

related_products.short_desc: Activity Messenger is an All-in-One Toolkit for Class & Camp management.
related_products.features:
Activity Messenger is an All-in-One Toolkit for Class & Camp management.

Activity Messenger offers Digital Waivers, SMS, Payments, Surveys, Email Marketing and Staff onboarding bundled in one place.

related_products.short_desc: Playbook is an all in one solution for camps to manage registrations, marketing, facilities, content, liability, and more.
related_products.features: Camp and youth activity registration and management built by experienced camp directors. Setup customized registration flows in minute for any type of camp. Integrates deeply with over 50 free marketing features, advanced security and liability management,  Instagram style journals for each camper with pictures and videos for each camper, and mobile apps for your staff to manage your campers throughout the day. Access advanced back end reports that automate bookkeeping and collections.

similar_products.short_desc: The all-in-one enrollment, billing, payments, and camp management software that keeps you rockin' and enrollin'.
similar_products.features: Enrollsy brings tremendous flexibility to camp management. You'll get customizable registration options, including pricing based on days/weeks attended, as well as apps and other tools for connecting staff with campers. Our one-on-one implementation support has helped both private and public camp programs optimize their process with digital enrollment, payment, e-signatures, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: NewBook's all-in-one campground management platform can help you increase your direct online bookings by up to 600%!
similar_products.features: NewBook's campground management platform was built by campground owners, for campground owners. Our software can help you streamline your operations, save you valuable time and money, increase your online reach, and maximize your revenue potential. Need proof? Our end-to-end campground management solution has helped our users increase direct reservations by up to 600%!

similar_products.short_desc: Manages day camps, sleep away, summer camps. Online registration, Parent Portal, photo hosting, mass email, news and more.
similar_products.features:
Manages day camps, sleep away, summer camps. Online registration, Parent Portal, photo hosting, mass email, news, announcements, unlimited custom fields, custom reporting, attendance tracking, medication tracking, payment plans and much more. Keep track of campers, staff and leads.

We do not do events management, conferences or RV camp sites.

With UltraCamp management software, you will be able to create conditional registration options, ask questions, create payment plans, collect signatures, customize required waivers and more! 

The UltraCamp Advantage:
No contracts,
transparent pricing based on actual use,
unlimited custom reports,
unlimited staff/volunteer users, and
unlimited one-on-one training.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your camp with a mobile, beautiful system built for today. Great year-end discounts are available!
similar_products.features: Cogran runs everything from your signups to your everyday. Beautiful registrations make registrants happy.  Use Cogran's great admin tools to manage, swap, and update registrations, send emails and texts, print rosters, use online attendance tools, and more. Handle waitlists, too! Sealess payments are easy to manage with great reports and integrated refunds and discounts. Cogran is ideal for daycamps, after-school programs, and year-round organizations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Parks and Recreation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Parks and Recreation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Parks and Recreation software helps municipalities, parks, and community centers with activity scheduling, facility management, and fee collection automation and tracking.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

pricing_plans.name: Regpack
pricing_plans.description: Pricing plans start at $125 per month, per admin with the payment processing cost at 2.1%.
